00002  * @file server.c

00007 #include <pthread.h>
00008 #include <sys/types.h>
00009 #include <unistd.h>
00010 #include "server.h"
00011 
00012 // PRIVATE
00013 pthread_t sThread;
00014 void *server_thread(void *params);
00015 int server_open_port(int port);

00018 /**
00019  * Initialize the server thread
00020  */
00021 void server_init(server_params *params) {
00022 
00023         pthread_create(&sThread, NULL, &server_thread, (void *) &params);
00024 
00025 }//
00026 
00027 /**
00028  * Erlang Server Thread
00029  *
00030  * Handles requests coming from an Erlang client
00031  *
00032  */
00033 void *server_thread(void *params) {
00034         int listen_socket = 0;
00035 
00036         server_params *parameters = (server_params *) params;
00037 
00038         doLog(LOG_DEBUG,"Server Thread Started, port[%u], pid[%u]", parameters->port, getpid());
00039 
00040         // open server socket
00041         listen_socket = server_open_port( parameters->port );
00042         if (listen_socket <= 0) {
00043                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot open server socket");
00044                 return NULL;
00045         }
00046 
00047         // connect to the Erlang subsystem
00048         ei_cnode node;
00049 
00050         if (ei_connect_init(&node, "phidget_manager", parameters->cookie, 0) < 0) {
00051                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot connect to the Erlang subsystem");
00052                 return NULL;
00053         }
00054 
00055         // publish our server port through Erlang EPMD
00056         if (ei_publish(&node, parameters->port) == -1) {
00057                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot publish server port with Erlang EPMD");
00058                 return NULL;
00059         }
00060 
00061         //if ((fd = erl_accept(listen, &conn)) == ERL_ERROR) {
00062         //      doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot publish server port with Erlang EPMD");
00063         //      return 1;
00064         //}
00065 
00066 
00067         //main loop
00068         while(1) {
00069                 sleep(5);
00070         }
00071 
00072 
00073 
00074         return 0;
00075 }// server_thread
00076 
00077 
00078 /**
00079  * Opens the local socket port
00080  */
00081 int server_open_port(int port) {
00082 
00083   int listen_fd;
00084   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00085   int on = 1;
00086 
00087   if ((listen_fd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) < 0)
00088     return (-1);
00089 
00090   setsockopt(listen_fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &on, sizeof(on));
00091 
00092   memset((void*) &addr, 0, (size_t) sizeof(addr));
00093   addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00094   addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00095   addr.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00096 
00097   if (bind(listen_fd, (struct sockaddr*) &addr, sizeof(addr)) < 0)
00098     return (-1);
00099 
00100   listen(listen_fd, 5);
00101 
00102   return listen_fd;
00103 }//[/open_port]
